instructions: If you haven t already, install the Google Smart Lock app . On your iPhone or iPad, open Settings . Tap Passwords & Accounts and then Add Account and then Google . Follow the instructions to sign in to your account. When you re prompted, open the Google Smart Lock app. Sign in or choose your account. Follow the steps to create a 6-digit temporary code. Open Settings again. Enter your 6-digit code. Tap Next .

On your iPhone or iPad, tap Settings . Tap Passwords & Accounts and then Gmail and then Delete Account and then Delete from My iPhone . This will remove your account from the phone, but no data will be deleted from your Google Account. On the "Passwords & Accounts " screen, tap Add Account and then Google . Start again on step 4 for using your Google Account with some iPhone or iPad apps.
